segments.text: Is there anything else , apart from the Credit Rating and Debt to Asset Ratio ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There is the Balance of Net Liabilities . This must not exceed its net assets and no business loss can be shown during the past two years .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Right , OK . That , again , shouldn't be a problem .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And the total ratio of return on assets should not be lower than the average , for that particular industry , for the first two quarters of the year .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , as far as I can tell , we qualify .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course we will need proof , originals and duplicate of everything . As soon as you bring in the proof and we assess it , it should be very quick indeed .
segments.speaker: S2
